definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: He turned the desert into pools of water and the parched ground into flowing springs;
sentences.chinese: 他使旷野变为水潭，叫旱地变为水泉。

sentences.english: Whoever lives in billabong, its name is society.
sentences.chinese: 所有人活在叫社会的死水潭，不管你是谁。

sentences.english: I lay down beside it, and with my pale fingers I touched the broad leaves.
sentences.chinese: 我躺在水潭边上，用我苍白的手指摩挲宽大的树叶。

sentences.english: Small bodies of water pockmark the flat face of the area.
sentences.chinese: 那地区平坦的地面上坑坑洼洼地布满了小水潭。

sentences.english: No water and muddy paths with stagnant pools which bred mosquitoes," Mubarak Ali said.
sentences.chinese: 没有水，道路泥泞，死水潭蚊子孳生”。

sentences.english: Tom:If you're taking the subway, get off at Jishuitan.
sentences.chinese: 坐地铁的话，到积水潭站下就可以了。

sentences.english: If you're taking the subway, get off at Jishuitan.
sentences.chinese: 坐地铁的话，到积水潭站下就可以了。

sentences.english: Go back into the pool, I expect.
sentences.chinese: 我想，回到水潭里就行了。

sentences.english: Big jump into deep swimming hole, Togitogiga Waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 跳进托基托基加瀑布的深水潭里。

sentences.english: Choosing such a tide , I hoped for a glimpse of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 我选好这样一个低潮的时机，希望能看一眼水潭。

sentences.english: In front of the temple was a pool of clear water paved with veined onyx.
sentences.chinese: 庙宇前是用条纹玛瑙砌的净水潭。

sentences.english: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
sentences.chinese: 他使旷野变为水潭，叫旱地变为水泉。

sentences.english: He drank thirstily from the pool under the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他饥渴地喝着岩石下水潭中的水。

sentences.english: Get off at Jishuitan Station, three stops from here.
sentences.chinese: 在积水潭下车，离这儿在三站。

definition: mouth of a spring or fountain
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
